property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: plugin ACTION WelcomeScreen.Plugins scratch ACTION NewScratchBuffer ter ACTION ActivateTerminalToolWindow clip null null overlay null null card_clip null null

task.summary:
Straighten out some clip overlap behavior, reduce lag on mobile
Floating widget is now drawn on its own layer thanks to the transform: translateZ(0); css hack. This is especially important for reducing lag when the mobile keyboard is opened.
The page footer is back at the bottom of the mobile layout. It also includes space after the footer for the expanded widget so that the last page image can be viewed even when the menu is open.

Add sharing panel and implement direct linking to articles through url query strings.
Also change image loading gif.

Implement more robust url parsing, replace sharing buttons.
Also roll back change regarding loading thumbnails instead of full-size images on mobile. This didn't seem to be making a huge difference in scrolling speed, and on a solid connection, the delay incurred as the server generated the thumbnails made image time significantly greater than when full-size images were used.

Implement more robust url parsing, replace sharing buttons.
Also roll back change regarding loading thumbnails instead of full-size images on mobile. This didn't seem to be making a huge difference in scrolling speed, and on a solid connection, the delay incurred as the server generated the thumbnails made image time significantly greater than when full-size images were used.

Merge pull request #5 from kvloxx/gh-pages
Implement more robust url parsing, replace sharing buttons.
Restructure project in "web starter kit" style
Fix src/href attributes to point to correct locations
Fixed distribution scripts generation and referencing

MESSAGE.value:
Straighten out some clip overlap behavior, reduce lag on mobile
Floating widget is now drawn on its own layer thanks to the transform: translateZ(0); css hack. This is especially important for reducing lag when the mobile keyboard is opened.
The page footer is back at the bottom of the mobile layout. It also includes space after the footer for the expanded widget so that the last page image can be viewed even when the menu is open.

Add sharing panel and implement direct linking to articles through url query strings.
Also change image loading gif.

Implement more robust url parsing, replace sharing buttons.
Also roll back change regarding loading thumbnails instead of full-size images on mobile. This didn't seem to be making a huge difference in scrolling speed, and on a solid connection, the delay incurred as the server generated the thumbnails made image time significantly greater than when full-size images were used.

Merge pull request #5 from kvloxx/gh-pages
Implement more robust url parsing, replace sharing buttons.
Restructure project in "web starter kit" style
Fix src/href attributes to point to correct locations
Fixed distribution scripts generation and referencing

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed distribution scripts generation and referencing
